name: Thulcandra
description: '''Thulcandra''' is a German [[Melodic black-death|melodic black/death metal]] band from [[Munich]]. They have released five full-length studio albums, one demo, one EP, three books and six music videos to date. Their latest album ''Hail the Abyss'' was released in 2023 through [[Napalm Records]]. The band's style is described as melodic black metal and inspired by bands such as [[Dissection (band)|Dissection]], [[Sacramentum (band)|Sacramentum]], and [[Unanimated]].
